thread.title: Iran and Hezbollah vowed revenge against Israel. Why hasn't it come? | Ap | thederrick.com
thread.title_full: Iran and Hezbollah vowed revenge against Israel. Why hasn't it come? | Ap | thederrick.com

author: Nabih Bulos - Los Angeles Times (TNS)
title: Iran and Hezbollah vowed revenge against Israel. Why hasn't it come? | Ap | thederrick.com
text: BEIRUT — After the double assassination last month of Hamas leader Ismail Haniyeh in Tehran and a high-ranking Hezbollah commander in Beirut, Iran and Hezbollah vowed retaliation against Israel, saying that vengeance was a "matter of honor."
